name: WordPress Buffer – HYPESocial. Social Media Auto Post, Social Media Auto Publish and Schedule
author: hypestudio,dejanmarkovic,nytogroup,freemius

sections.description:
WordPress Buffer HYPESocial connects your WordPress site to Buffer app (buffer.com) (your account) and allows you to automatically share/re-share your old and new Posts/Pages/Custom Post Types to all major Social Media Networks from your WordPress dashboard!

For professionals and agencies, we strongly recommend checking out our newest all-in-one social media marketing platform Social Web Suite.

Social Web Suite and WordPress

Social Web Suite for Professional Bloggers

Social Web Suite for Social Media Managers

Check out all our videos here

Social Web Suite

Why you should upgrade to HYPESocial – Buffer PRO?

Supported Social Media Networks

Twitter,
Facebook,
LinkedIn,
Google+,
Instagram,
Pinterest

We have been featured on!

WP Solution
WPKube
Buffer
WP Warfare

  • It saves your time – ** Social Media Auto Post to your Posts/Pages/Custom Post Types** to all major Social Media Platforms (** Twitter,Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, Instagram, Pinterest**). Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required
  • It is an easiest way to generate more traffic for your website.Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required
  • It saves you money by becoming your own Social Media Manager. Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required
  • It connects all major Social Media Networks with your WordPress site. Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required
  • It is the simplest way to schedule, manage and share updates to Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Google + and LinkedIn
    Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required
  • It improves SEO of your site by having more links back from Social Media Networks. Please note: Buffer (buffer.com) free or paid account is required

Join HypeSocial Buffer Community!

Some of the WordPress Buffer – HYPESocial PRO notable features:

  • Social Media Auto Post or Social Media Auto Publish new or existing content – all your content is eligible to be re-shared automatically
  • Social Media Auto Post or Social Media Auto Publish Custom Post Types (CPT’s) support
  • Several URL shortener service providers to choose from
  • Share featured images with your posts
  • Custom scheduling available, even for individual posts and pages
  • Customize your posts with your own personal messages
  • Choose the time between the posts
  • Use hashtags to focus on topics (several options available)
  • Create your own hashtags to be included in your posts
  • Custom position link/title – choose your message structure with links at beginning or end
  • Choose the number of posts to be shared
  • Multiple Social Media Accounts to choose from
  • Exclude categories you don’t want to share
  • Choose the categories you want to share
  • Choose tags/categories as hashtags
  • “One Size Fits All Image”– custom resizing of your images so they can look awesome across all Social Media Platforms
  • Social Media Schedule days and times to post for every Social Media Account
  • Post now option available for all and for single post/pages
  • Add posting time directly from our Global Settings (no need to login into Buffer)

To stay up to date follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook and Join HypeSocial Buffer Community!

Please note that this plugin requires Buffer APP Access Token in order to connect your WordPress site to Buffer App (buffer.com). We have created detailed documentation which is available with the purchase of our PRO version only. Also, we have optimized the code for better performance which you can see when you purchase our PRO version.

Please understand that this is a free plugin and the only support we offer through the WordPress forums is for bugs.
If you would like to receive our premium support please consider buying wordPress Buffer – HYPESocial PRO)!

Free version is limited to 2 Social Network accounts and it doesn’t support sharing of Featured Images(as that functionality is improved a lot and it is available in pro version only).

Tags: Tweet old post, Tweets, Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, Twitter, Promote old post by tweeting about them, Twitter, Auto Tweet, Hashtags, wordpress auto post,wordpress auto post to facebook,wordpress auto post to social media,wordpress social media plugin,wordpress social share plugin, Twitter Hashtags, Tweet Posts, Tweet, Post Tweets, WordPress Twitter Plugin, Twitter Plugin, Tweet Selected Posts, Twitter, Promote Posts, Tweet Random Post, Share Post, Promote Post, Post Tweets, WordPress Twitter, Drive Traffic, Tweet Selected Posts, HYPESocial – Buffer PRO, Post To Buffer, Buffer Post, Buffer Old Post, Buffer, Social Media, SEO, Custom Post Types, Buffer App, Promote pages, Share Posts, Share Pages, Automation, Integration, HYPESocial – Buffer, Buffer My Post, Social Media Manager, Social Media Platforms, Social Media Networks, Share New Posts, Share New Pages, Share New Custom Post Types, Share Old Posts, Share Old Pages, Share Old Custom Post Types, Share CPT’s, Share old CPT’s, buffer.com
sections.faq:
WordPress Buffer – HYPESocial does not post?

  • If its not posting try playing around with the options. Try setting max post age to 0 and try again. Also make sure your Access Token is correct.
  • Try removing categories from excluded option. Some of them have posted issues of Twitter not getting post when categories are selected in exclude category section.

New in v15.0.11

2. including fix/update for wordpress social share plugin functionality regarding the Buffer (buffer.com) Pinterest API.

New in v15.0.10

2. Another fix for wordpress social share plugin and wordpress social media plugin that is located inside of the hsb-core.
New in v15.0.8
1. updated readme file (fix of list of fetures list)
2. added bold on some keywords
3. deleted license blocks for wordpress auto post and wordpress auto post to facebook
4. multiple sidebar fixes

New in v15.0.7
1. updated readme file (fix of list of fetures list)

New in v15.0.6
1. updated readme file for wordpress auto post and wordpress auto post to facebook
2. wordpress social share plugin,wordpress auto post to social media plugin also updated to macth the Buffer (buffer.com) changes

New in v15.0.5
1. updated readme file added more details for wordpress social media plugin,wordpress social share plugin,wordpress auto post to social media plugin descriptions.
2. updated screenshots for wordpress auto post and wordpress auto post to facebook

New in v15.0.1
1. added changelog.txt
2. fixed the deprecated bug in bmp-debug.php
3. fixed admin style output n bmp-admin.php
4. fixed Notice: has_cap was called with an argument that is deprecated since version 2.0! WordPress auto post to all social media networks fixed. Usage of user levels by plugins and themes is deprecated in bmp_admin_actions() function. Fixed the issues with wordpress auto post, wordpress auto post to facebook and wordpress auto post to social media capabilities.
6. testing Instagram Buffer (buffer.com) API

New in v15.0.2
1. Compatible up to 4.2.2 wordpres core and for wordpress auto post and wordpress auto post, wordpress auto post to facebook and wordpress auto post to social media functionality.

New in v15.0.3
1. fixed css path issue that was breaking the layout in admin
2. added space between ” Dejan Markovic” and “you…” for wordpress social media plugin and wordpress social share plugin tasks.
3. Issues with Buffer (buffer.com) auto posting to facebook API fixed

New in v15.0.4
1. added again space between ” Dejan Markovic” and “you…” for wordpress social share plugin and wordpress social media plugin features

upgrade_notice:
1. please always upgrade to the latest version of our wordpress social share plugin and wordpress social media plugin settings.
  2. Update to Buffer (buffer.com) connectivity
